item.title: Initial support for declarative configuration
item.description: The common and only way to configure wildfly-swarm nodes was to use the Java API. With the inclusion of SWARM-14, external, declarative configuration of wildfly-swarm nodes becomes possible.
item.dc:creator: The WildFly Swarm Team

item.title: Announcement 1.0.0.Alpha6
item.description: WildFly Swarm is the decomposition and reconstitution of the popular WildFly Java Application Server in order to support just enough app-server for microservice type applications.
item.dc:creator: The WildFly Swarm Team
